general_advisory: In view of light rainfall, the sowing of seeds and top dressing of fertilizers or herbicides may be deferred for the time being. Before sowing, paddy seeds should be treated with Trichoderma powder formulation@10g/kg of seeds or any other seed treating chemicals like Thiram 75% @ 3 gm or Captan 50% @ 3 gm per kg of seeds...

advisory: Sow the paddy seeds in line preferably with seed drill or three tine cultivator...
Use 24-30 kg of paddy seeds/acre for broadcasting...
Apply full dose of Phosphorus and Potash...
There are chances of early shoot borer infestation...
In case of severe infestation spray Fipronil 5 % SC...
Apply 2 tonne of well decomposed FYM...
Keep line to line spacing of 30 cm...
For HYV apply 26 kg of DAP...
For Hybrids apply 35 kg of DAP...
Maintain row to row spacing at 60 cm whereas plant to spacing at 45 cm...
May to June is the optimum time for yam planting...
Cut the yam into pieces of 150-200 g each...
Carp such as Rohu, Catla and Mrigal, which grow rapidly...
Generally, a density of 5,000 fingerlings/ha is kept...
